title.content-text: 4.1.3 The ISP's Relationship with the Internet

brief.content-text:
Two Diagrams
Diagram 1, Animation
The diagram shows an individual home user connected to a Point of Presence (POP). Each POP is represented by a router and multiple POP's are grouped as ISP1. A business LAN user is also connected the same POP in the ISP1 cloud. Another individual home user is connected to a similar separate cloud called ISP2. These two clouds are connected by the Internet, also represented as a cloud.
The animation illustrates a message being sent from Home User 1, through the POP that it is connected to, to other POP's, through the Internet cloud, to ISP2 (via several POP's), to Home User 2. Home User 2 sends a response in the same manner, but reverse order.
